div.p:
Pag. VII med. pro De bapt. III lege: De bapt. IIII.
— — scriptis laudatis adde: W. Meyer, Gesammelto Abhandlungen
zur mittellateinischen Rhythmik (Berlin, 1905) uol. II, pag.18 sqq.
P. Monceaux, Histoire litt. de 1'Afrique chretienne (Paris,
1905) III, pag. 491 aqq.
— IX De Parmeniano eiusque operibus cf. P. Monceaux, Journal
des Savants 1909, pag. 21 aqq.

Pag. 363, 9 cum W scribendum Marcionistae; cf. uol. LI, pag. 354, 9.
— 403, 9 in adnot. dele: 'et Cypr. codd. AIA3'.
— 587 col. 2 pro *Prou. 24, 22 lege: *Prou. 24, 35 (30, 12).

Pag. 26, 16 et 28, 2 adnot. pro Prou. 24, 22 lege: Prou. 24, 36. 35.
— 254, 27 in adnot. lege: Eccli. 31 (84), 30.
— 320 col. 2 lin. 8 supra lege: tyranni.
